title: 4-11: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: It's finally here – the review you all may or may not have been waiting for! The boys conclude Season 4 with a wild adventure across Hyrule.

Ranking Info.Game: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

title: 4-10: Pokémon Sword and Shield
description: The latest pair of Pokémon games arrived with plenty of controversy – but now that the smoke has cleared, how do they actually stack up? The boys travel the region of Galar to find out.

title: 4-9: Burnout 2: Point of Impact
description: The boys speed toward the finish line without regard for life, limb, or property.

title: 4-8: Hollow Knight
description: Owo, what's this – known Metroid expert Ryebread joining the boys for a non-Metroid review? Truly these are interesting times.

title: 4-7: Sonic Adventure 2
description: Does this beloved entry in the Sonic series stand the test of time? The boys put on their fastest pairs of red shoes and find out. Spoiler alert: we hope the developers "Lived and Learned" from this one.

title: 4-6: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Bowser's back at it again, but this time, his shoes are much nicer than any white Vans. Can the boys successfully pursue him across the globe and foil his latest dastardly plan to kidnap Peach?

title: 4-5: Super Metroid
description: Another calassic is incoming. Get ready to zap some Space Pirates!

title: 4-4: Diddy Kong Racing
description: It only took us over two years to review the second big N64 kart racing game, but here we are.

title: 4-3: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons
description: Winter is transitioning to spring, and the boys celebrate the warmth with a seasonally-appropriate entry in the Zelda series.

Ranking Info.Game: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons

title: 4-2: Super Smash Bros. Brawl
description: It was only a matter of time before these Smash geeks decided to review a Smash game. Why not tackle the first truly epic game in the series, Super Smash Bros. Brawl?

title: 4-1: Mario Party 3
description: It's party time, y'all! The boys start off Season 4 with a rambunctious review courtesy of Mario Party 3.

title: 3-10: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
description: The boys invite special guest Ryan Everitt to the stage to review Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door for a fittingly cinematic conclusion to Season 3.

Ranking Info.Game: Paper Mario: The Thousand Year Door

title: 3-9: Shovel Knight
description: Steel thy shovel! The boys take on the Order of No Quarter in their review of the indie mainstay Shovel Knight.

title: 3-8: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: After years of training, the boys descend from the mountains of Tibet to present their review of Ocarina of Time.

Ranking Info.Game: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

title: 3-7: Perfect Dark
description: Step into the dark with the boys (ooo!) as they throw it back to Perfect Dark, the N64's spiritual successor to GoldenEye 007.

title: 3-6: Yooka-Laylee
description: Did the team at Playtonic Games successfully revive the magic of Banjo-Kazooie with their 2017 game Yooka-Laylee? The boys find out in true buddy-duo fashion.

title: 3-5: Age of Empires II
description: The boys decide that it's time (really) for some real-time strategy via the classic PC title Age of Empires II.

title: 3-4: Fortnite Battle Royale
description: Where we droppin', boys? In your ears, of course. Aaron Miller of Yeasty Boys fame joins Kevin and Peter to review a game so popular, even the dinosaurs know about it.

title: 3-3: Kirby's Adventure
description: Finally, an NES game! Join the boys as they take the highway to Dream Land and explore the Kirby game which set the stage for the series.

title: 3-2: Celeste
description: The boys reach new heights with Celeste, the darling indie platformer that's charmed audiences everywhere.

title: 3-1: Super Mario Galaxy 2
description: The boys return from their interstellar vacation to bring you a freshly-imported review of Super Mario Galaxy 2 for the Wii.

title: Listener Q&A
description: In their ongoing effort to B O N D with the fans out there, the boys field an array of listener-submitted questions. With topics ranging from speedrunning to special fart powers, you're guaranteed to learn more than you ever cared to know about your hosts!

title: Patron Appreciaton: Simon Webb
description: It boggles our minds that people are supporting our podcast financially via Patreon, so we sat down with early supporter Simon Webb to chat and to tell him we love him. Topics include zombie survival techniques, desert island game picks, and an embarrassing story from Kevin's past.

title: 2-11: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
description: The boys end Season 2 not with bang, but a tick-tock. Jason Tate of Yeasty Boys fame joins in for a review of the mysterious Majora's Mask chapter of the Legend of Zelda.

Ranking Info.Game: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask

title: 2-10: Metroid Prime
description: Joined again(!) by special guest Ryan "Ryebread" Everitt, the boys step onto the surface of Tallon IV to explore the depths of Metroid Prime.

title: 2-9: Cave Story+
description: With the help of special guest and new IG family member (literally!) dave_s_k, the boys go spelunking in the wondrous world of Cave Story.

title: 2-8:  Pokémon FireRed / LeafGreen
description: After teasing you back in Season 1 with a review of the Pokémon Stadium spinoff game, the boys finally Tackle the mainline series with FireRed and LeafGreen.

title: 2-7: Super Monkey Ball 2
description: At first I typed an intro that packed in every monkey-related pun I could think of, but it was pretty obnoxious. Anyway, the boys play Super Monkey Ball 2 for the Nintendo GameCube.

title: Side Quest with the Secret Levels Podcast
description: The boys join their good buddies Toby and Goobz on the Secret Levels podcast to chat about Mega Man X, video games in general, and the origins of their respective shows!

title: 2-6: Mega Man X
description: The boys take on the Mavericks with the help of Matt (a.k.a. Clubfrills), our first special guest of our second season.

title: 2-5: Luigi's Mansion
description: Your scaredy-cat co-hosts bring you a special episode to give you that Halloween feel: a review of a truly frightening horror game, Luigi's Mansion.

title: 2-4: Chopper Attack
description: Wanna party tonight? The boys got you covered with this review of Chopper Attack, a (ahem) classic N64 title.

title: Rating Revisions
description: The boys look through the lens of 20/20 hindsight to correct the mistakes of their past. (I'm being melodramatic – we just tweaked ratings for some games, mostly from season 1.) Enjoy this mini-episode!

title: 2-3: Donkey Kong Country
description: The boys get down to (monkey) business with two very different perspectives on Rare's premiere primate platformer, Donkey Kong Country.

title: 2-2: Rocket League
description: What a save! The boys review a modern, non-Fortnite game that's sure to satisfy your adrenaline cravings – the esteemed and ever-popular Rocket League.

title: 2-1: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
description: The boys are back on the road! Season 2 begins with a first-time-playing perspective on A Link to the Past, one of the most-admired games in the illustrious Legend of Zelda franchise.

Ranking Info.Game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past

title: E3 2018
description: The boys take a break from their break to discuss their impressions of E3 2018 with the help of returning guest Ryan Everitt! Spoiler alert: we spend 30 minutes fanboying over Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

title: 1-10: Stardew Valley
description: The boys close out Season 1 with a game that's actually from this decade! Grab your farming tools and fishing rod, because it's time to visit Stardew Valley.

title: 1-9: Banjo-Kazooie
description: Hup, two, three, four! The boys marvel at the piece of platforming perfection that is Banjo-Kazooie for the Nintendo 64.

title: 1-8: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
description: Join real-life professional skaters KSlugs and deal_4_real as they review the very game which brought skating to the masses – Tony Hawk's Pro Skater. Shred the gnar!

title: 1-7: Pokémon Stadium
description: Gotta critique 'em all! The boys review Pokémon Stadium, an N64 game darling to PokéFans the world over.

title: April Fool: Introducing the Interstate Insiders Program!
description: The boys are excited to announce the Interstate Insiders program! Our biggest fans can enjoy early access to a ton of new material we've been working on, like videos, live streams, and more. Tune in for details!

title: 1-6: Super Mario World
description: The boys tackle one of the most legendary games for one of the most legendary consoles – Super Mario World for the Super Nintendo.

title: 1-5: Metroid Zero Mission
description: In this Kraid-sized episode, the boys recruit resident Metroid expert Ryan Everitt to help them navigate the labyrinth of Metroid: Zero Mission for the Game Boy Advance.

title: 1-4: Kirby and the Amazing Mirror
description: The boys jump into the aughts to review Kirby and the Amazing Mirror for the Game Boy Advance.

title: 1-3: RollerCoaster Tycoon
description: Hold onto your harnesses, because this one's a doozy! The boys review a PC classic in RollerCoaster Tycoon.

title: 1-2: Star Fox 64
description: The boys break down another N64 classic in Star Fox 64.

title: 1-1: Mario Kart 64
description: The boys review Mario Kart 64 in their inaugural episode.

title: We Are The Interstate Gamers – Promo
description: The boys record a promotional trailer for the Interstate Gamers podcast and tell you what the show is all about!
